entry.title: Hortonworks Data Platform for Windows
entry.summary: Includes Apache Hadoop, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie, HCatalog, and Templeton.

entry.title: Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Windows Azure
entry.summary: Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Windows Azure provides a development environment for Windows Azure HDInsight Service and is powered by the Hortonworks Data Platform (including Apache Hadoop, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie, HCatalog, and Templeton).
entry.longSummary: HDInsight is Microsoft's Big Data Solution, powered by Apache Hadoop and built on the Hortonworks Data Platform for Windows (HDP). It combines the simplicity of Windows with the power and reliability of the HDP to deliver big data insights from Apache Hadoop. The emulator targets developer scenarios and as such only support single-node deployments.

entry.title: Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Windows Azure (Preview)
entry.summary: Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Windows Azure provides a development environment for Windows Azure HDInsight Service and is powered by the Hortonworks Data Platform (including Apache Hadoop, Hive, Pig, Sqoop, Oozie, HCatalog, and Templeton).
entry.longSummary: This product refers to a preview version of the Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Windows Azure, formerly known as HDInsight Developer Preview. This product has now been officially released and is no longer in preview. You will be automatically redirected to the latest version during this installation, but please note that in the future any links that refer directly to this preview version may be disabled. The current release of the emulator will continue to be available by searching for Microsoft HDInsight Emulator for Windows Azure in the Web Platform Installer, or at the More Information link below.

metadata.title: Non Visual Studio 2013 RTM
metadata.longSummary: Non Visual Studio 2013 RTM before proceeding.

entry.title: Python Tools 2.0 for Visual Studio 2010
entry.summary: Adds support for Python to Visual Studio 2010.
entry.longSummary: Adds support for the Python programming language to Professional, Ultimate, and the "integrated shell" versions of Visual Studio 2010.

entry.title: Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated)
entry.summary: The Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated) Redistributable Package contains the runtime binaries that are required to deploy an application that is based on the Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
entry.longSummary: The Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode) provides the foundation on which you can seamlessly integrate tools and programming languages within Visual Studio. The Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode) does not contain any programming language, so it provides the perfect foundation to deploy a development environment for your own language. The Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode) seamlessly integrates with Visual Studio 2010 Professional and above. Any tools and programming languages that run inside the Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode) will run together with Visual Studio 2010 if they are also installed on the same machine. By using the Visual Studio Shell (integrated mode), you will not need to make Visual Studio a pre-requisite on your user machines.

incompatibleProduct.errorMessage: You must uninstall Beta 1 of Visual Studio 2010 before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual Studio 2010 before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual Web Developer 2010 Express before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual Basic 2010 Express before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual C# 2010 Express before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Beta 2 of Visual C++ 2010 Express before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).
You must uninstall Visual Studio 2010 RC before you can install Visual Studio 2010 Shell (Integrated).

terms.termsText: -Visual Studio will receive and display online RSS content. For further information refer to the Readme link.

entry.title: Windows Azure SDK Oct 2008 CTP release is installed, please uninstall before trying again
Expression Web 4 Trial
entry.summary: Microsoft Expression Web 4 gives you the tools you need to produce high-quality, standards-based Web sites: built-in support for today's Web standards, sophisticated CSS design capabilities, and visual diagnostic tools. Whether you work with PHP, HTML/XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, ASP.NET or ASP.NET AJAX, Expression Web makes it faster and easier to create and maintain exceptional Web sites.
entry.longSummary: Microsoft Expression Web 4 gives you the tools you need to produce high-quality, standards-based Web sites: built-in support for today's Web standards, sophisticated CSS design capabilities, and visual diagnostic tools. Whether you work with PHP, HTML/XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, ASP.NET or ASP.NET AJAX, Expression Web makes it faster and easier to create and maintain exceptional Web sites.

entry.title: Expression SuperPreview Trial
entry.summary: Microsoft® Expression® SuperPreview is a cross-browser debugging tool that helps you visualize and understand how pages display on multiple browsers, including IE6 – 9, Chrome, Macintosh Safari, and Firefox. SuperPreview provides an abundance of tools and view modes that help you find cross-browser rendering issues, including rulers and guides, page overlay mode, and styling information from the page DOM. You can even superimpose your page on top of your Photoshop comp to verify your coding.
entry.longSummary: Microsoft® Expression® SuperPreview is a cross-browser debugging tool that helps you visualize and understand how pages display on multiple browsers, including IE6 – 9, Chrome, Macintosh Safari, and Firefox. SuperPreview provides an abundance of tools and view modes that help you find cross-browser rendering issues, including rulers and guides, page overlay mode, and styling information from the page DOM. You can even superimpose your page on top of your Photoshop comp to verify your coding.
